dict.string: If clean and dry, cardboard can be placed in your clear sack for recycling.
If clean and dry, glass bottles and jars can be placed in your clear sack for recycling.
If clean and dry, metal tins, cans and aerosols can be placed in your clear sack for recycling.
If clean and dry, paper can be placed in your clear sack for recycling.
If clean and dry, plastic bottles, tubs, trays and pots can be placed in your clear sack for recycling.
Hammersmith and Fulham does not accept food-soiled packaging, polystyrene, shredded paper, food waste, plastic wrappers, foil, paper towels, plastic bags or textils in your clear sack for recycling.
